mdRecordxmlns.dcterms:title: Turning From Foreign to Domestic Policy
mdRecordxmlns.dcterms:creator: Pratt, Newton
mdRecordxmlns.dcterms:description: (Turning from foreign to domestic policy.)(Make the world [America] safe for democracy!)(The United States Bee)(Communists Stage Rally to Incite Labor Unrest. Democracy is ridiculed.)(German Bund Holds Meeting to Revile U.S. Democracy is ridiculed as Bund Demands Protection of Free Speech.)

Prior to World War II, the German American bund was a group in the U.S. that supported causes involving Germany, such as the Nazi party and Socialism. They were notably anti-communist.Also during that time period, unemployment rates were very high and communist organizations were using "unemployment rallies" to promote Communism.
mdRecordxmlns.dcterms:subject: American
Cartoons (Commentary)
World War, 1939-1945
